key.name: device
key.description: The name of the device to monitor

key.name: show-sum
key.description: If true, show sum of inbound/outbound speed instead of separated ones.

key.name: show-bits
key.description: If true, show speed in bits instead of bytes.

key.name: short-unit
key.description: If true, shorten unit legend to one letter: lowercase for bits / uppercase for Bytes.

key.name: change-icon
key.description: If true, change the icon due to selected device.

key.name: auto-change-device
key.description: If true, change automatically the selected device.

key.name: in-color
key.description: The color of the graph of the inbound traffic

key.name: out-color
key.description: The color of the graph of the outbound traffic

key.name: up-command
key.description: Command the execute to activate the device

key.name: down-command
key.description: Command the execute to shut down the device
